channel.title: Opus 367 Final Recordings
channel.description: Brian "Doc" Miller peforms UNC and Sinfonia Songs. Recorded in Hill Hall Auditorium on the campus of the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill.

item.title: Parting Song
item.description: Brian Miller and the Alpha Rho Chapter perfrom this song which ends all Fraternity meetings. (Running Time 01:43)

item.title: Sinfonia Anthem
item.description: Brian Miller and the Alpha Rho Chapter perform this fraternity song, better known as "All Hail Sinfonian Brothers." (Running Time 00:42)

item.title: Red and Black - Hark The Sound
item.description: Brian Miller and the Alpha Rho Chapter perform this fraternity anthem which segues into "Hark The Sound" and "Tag!" (Running Time 02:31)

item.title: The Blue and White
item.description: Brian Miller performs this Marching Tar Heels favorite arranged for band by Brothers Potter and Ripperton with words by Brian Miller, himself. (Running Time 00:50)

item.title: The Tar Heel March
item.description: Brian Miller peforms this commencement favorite, which was the inspiration for "Tag!" (I'm a Tar Heel Born). (Running Time 02:05)

item.title: UNC School Songs
item.description: Brian Miller performs UNC School Songs: "Here Comes Carolina", "Tar Heels on Hand", "Carolina Victory", "Carolina Fight Song", "North Carolina", "Hark The Sound", and "Tag!" (Running Time 03:14)
